languages.text: "Благодарю, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Я рад, что Око Его прозрело истину и не дало лжи лицемерия застить ваш взгляд". {n}Важно одернув богатую рясу, священник уходит к замку.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: FW_HideAndSeek2_TruePriest_Male_name кланяется и в конце куя уходит к замку

traits.locale_text: "Да хранит вас Око Его, госпо{mf|дин|жа}, что зрит в душах и и не дает сбиться с пути истинного". {n}На исхудавшем лице написано глубокое смирение. Склонившись, словно сухое дерево, священник уходит к замку, где уже ожидают своего победителя маски зазывал.{/n}

languages.translation_comment: FW_HideAndSeek2_TruePriest_Male_name кланяется и в конце куя уходит к замку

languages.text: "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. I am glad that His Eye has seen the truth and did not let paltry deceptions cloud your powers of insight." {n}With an air of profound sagacity and clad in his rich robes, the priest heads toward the castle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Я рад, что Око Его прозрело истину и не дало лжи лицемерия застить ваш взгляд". {n}Важно одернув богатую рясу, священник уходит к замку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. I am glad that His Eye has seen the truth and did not let paltry deceptions cloud your powers of insight." {n}With an air of profound sagacity, the priest in rich robes heads toward the castle.{/n}

"Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. I am glad that His Eye has seen the truth and did not let paltry deceptions cloud your powers of insight." {n}With an air of profound sagacity, the priest in rich robes heads toward the castle.{/n}

"Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. I am glad that His Eye has seen the truth and did not let paltry deceptions cloud your powers of insight." {n}With an air of profound sagacity and clad in his rich robes, the priest heads toward the castle.{/n}

"Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. I am glad that His Eye has seen the truth and did not let paltry deceptions cloud your powers of insight." {n}With an air of profound sagacity and clad in his rich robes, the priest heads toward the castle.{/n}

"Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. I am glad that His Eye has seen the truth and did not let paltry deceptions cloud your powers of insight." {n}With an air of profound sagacity and clad in his rich robes, the priest heads toward the castle.{/n}

"Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. I am glad that His Eye has seen the truth and did not let paltry deceptions cloud your powers of insight." {n}With an air of profound sagacity and clad in his rich robes, the priest heads toward the castle.{/n}

languages.text: “感谢您，大人。我很高兴，祂的全知之眼看到了真相，没有让微不足道的欺骗蒙蔽您的真知灼见。”{n}这位年轻的牧师穿着华丽的长袍，脸上带着睿智的神情，朝城堡的方向走远了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. I am glad that His Eye has seen the truth and did not let paltry deceptions cloud your powers of insight." {n}With an air of profound sagacity and clad in his rich robes, the priest heads toward the castle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “感谢您，大人。我很高兴，祂的全知之眼看到了真相，没有让微不足道的欺骗蒙蔽您的真知灼见。”{n}这位年轻的牧师穿着华丽的长袍，脸上带着睿智的神情，朝城堡的方向走远了。{/n}

languages.text: «Gracias, {mf|milord|milady}. Me alegro de que Su ojo viese la verdad y no dejase que esos burdos engaños nublasen su buen juicio». {n}El sacerdote de suntuosas vestiduras se dirige hacia el castillo dándose aires de profunda sagacidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. I am glad that His Eye has seen the truth and did not let paltry deceptions cloud your powers of insight." {n}With an air of profound sagacity and clad in his rich robes, the priest heads toward the castle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, {mf|milord|milady}. Me alegro de que Su ojo viese la verdad y no dejase que esos burdos engaños nublasen su buen juicio». {n}El sacerdote de suntuosas vestiduras se dirige hacia el castillo dándose aires de profunda sagacidad.{/n}

languages.text: "Teşekkür ederim {mf|lordum|leydim}. O'nun Gözü'nün gerçeği görmesi ve önemsiz aldatmacaların sizin kavrayış kudretinizi bulandırmasına izin vermemeniz beni mutlu etti." {n}Rahip, derin bir bilgelik havasıyla ve zengin cübbeleri içinde kaleye doğru yöneliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. I am glad that His Eye has seen the truth and did not let paltry deceptions cloud your powers of insight." {n}With an air of profound sagacity and clad in his rich robes, the priest heads toward the castle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkür ederim {mf|lordum|leydim}. O'nun Gözü'nün gerçeği görmesi ve önemsiz aldatmacaların sizin kavrayış kudretinizi bulandırmasına izin vermemeniz beni mutlu etti." {n}Rahip, derin bir bilgelik havasıyla ve zengin cübbeleri içinde kaleye doğru yöneliyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「ありがとうございます、閣下。陛下の目が真実を見抜き、卑劣な見せかけがあなたの洞察力を曇らせなかったことを嬉しく思います」{n}深い洞察力と高級なローブに身を包み、司祭は城に向かって進む。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. I am glad that His Eye has seen the truth and did not let paltry deceptions cloud your powers of insight." {n}With an air of profound sagacity and clad in his rich robes, the priest heads toward the castle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとうございます、閣下。陛下の目が真実を見抜き、卑劣な見せかけがあなたの洞察力を曇らせなかったことを嬉しく思います」{n}深い洞察力と高級なローブに身を包み、司祭は城に向かって進む。{/n}

languages.text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. Je me réjouis de voir que Son Œil a pu discerner la vérité du mensonge et a empêché le voile de la duplicité d'obscurcir votre jugement. » {n}Drapé dans sa robe somptueuse, le prêtre se dirige vers le château d'une démarche assurée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. I am glad that His Eye has seen the truth and did not let paltry deceptions cloud your powers of insight." {n}With an air of profound sagacity and clad in his rich robes, the priest heads toward the castle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. Je me réjouis de voir que Son Œil a pu discerner la vérité du mensonge et a empêché le voile de la duplicité d'obscurcir votre jugement. » {n}Drapé dans sa robe somptueuse, le prêtre se dirige vers le château d'une démarche assurée.{/n}

languages.text: "Danke, {mf|Herr|Herrin}. Ich bin froh, dass Sein Auge die Wahrheit gesehen hat und nicht zugelassen hat, dass Euer Urteil durch jämmerliche Täuschungen getrübt wird." {n}Mit diesen ausgesprochen weisen Worten geht der Priester in seinen edlen Roben Richtung Burg.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. I am glad that His Eye has seen the truth and did not let paltry deceptions cloud your powers of insight." {n}With an air of profound sagacity and clad in his rich robes, the priest heads toward the castle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Danke, {mf|Herr|Herrin}. Ich bin froh, dass Sein Auge die Wahrheit gesehen hat und nicht zugelassen hat, dass Euer Urteil durch jämmerliche Täuschungen getrübt wird." {n}Mit diesen ausgesprochen weisen Worten geht der Priester in seinen edlen Roben Richtung Burg.
